quote-source: Edwin Lyngar, I was poor, but a GOP die-hard: How I finally left the politics of shame, Salon, July 16, 2014.
quote-text: To make up for my own failures, I voted to give rich people tax cuts, because somewhere deep inside, I knew they were better than me.  They earned it.  My support for conservative politics was atonement for the original sin of being white trash.
